The photo was shared on Facebook: Twitter, and South African websites with a claim that it shows a 13-year-old COVID-19 victim in the UK.
The post: s caption stated that the 13-year-old boy, Ismail Mohamed Abdulwahab, died from COVID-19 without any family members close by.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: who died due to a "choking game" found on the internet.
